Two young women who met on the plains and
formed a bond that extends even to wearing
unfamiliar ninja garb. They appear in Fire
Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

A skilled mercenary swordsman. Friendly and
free from prejudice, he's answered the call to
join the ninja festival. Appears in Fire Emblem:
Path of Radiance.

A samurai from Hoshido who serves as Sakura's
retainer. She heard the ninja festival was being
held and is attending with pride and high spirits.
Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

The younger princess of Múspell, joining in on
the ninja festivities and donning ninja garb to
help her sister.

A master swordsman known as the Scarlet
Sword. He's dressed as a ninja to join in on
the festival! Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery
of the Emblem.

(Duo Skills can be used once per map by
tapping the Duo button. Duo Skills cannot
be used by units deployed using Pair Up.)

Standard Effect 1: Duel
If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total
less than 190, treats unit's stats as 190 in
modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents
will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any
values added by merges and skills.)

With their high speed, they can attack
up to 4 times! Their Duo Skill also
gives them another action.

She can attack twice with her two
axes—and half of her bonuses are
added to her attack!

With speed over his foe's, his Special
speeds up and he deals +5 damage.
Can attack 4 times and do 2 Specials!

$aGrants Spd+3. Calculates damage from staff
like other weapons. After combat, if unit
attacked, inflicts【Gravity】on target and foes
within 1 space of target.

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through
its next action.

At start of turn, if an ally is within 2 spaces
of unit, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and
allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

If unit or ally initiates combat against
a foe within 2 spaces of unit, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on that foe
during combat.

$aIf【Bonus】is active on unit, inflicts Atk/Res-4
on foe and grants Special cooldown charge +1
per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. Special cooldown
charge granted even if foe's attack deals
0 damage.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

$aIf unit's HP < 100% at start of combat,
or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Spd/Def+5 to unit during combat and
inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe
per attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Res+5 during combat and unit makes a
guaranteed follow-up attack.

Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates
combat, unit attacks twice.

Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates
combat, unit attacks twice.

Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates

Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates

Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates

Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates

Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice. (Even if foe
initiates combat, unit attacks twice.) Grants
bonus to unit's Atk = half of total bonuses on
unit during combat.

$aAccelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Grants Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4. If unit initiates
combat, unit attacks twice.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Atk+Def total
through its next action.

At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Atk+Def total
through its next action.

Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

At start of turn, grants Spd/Def+1 to ally
with the highest Spd+Def total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

At start of turn, grants Spd/Def+3 to ally
with the highest Spd+Def total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

At start of turn, grants Spd/Def+5 to ally
with the highest Spd+Def total for 1 turn.

Grants unit another action. (May be used only
if unit has already entered combat during the

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

6 damage to unit.

Effective against armored and cavalry foes.
Grants Res+3. If foe uses bow, dagger, magic,
or staff, reduces damage from foe's first attack
